p: Binding energy calculations show that thymol and thymol interact with high affinity in the AChE binding pocket, having Δ G bind values of -18.49 and -26.88 kcal/mol, respectively. The binding free energy decomposition reveals that the van der Waals (Δ E vdW) contribution represents a large proportion of the interactions of the ligands in AChE binding pocket. The electrostatic (Δ E electrostatic) and non-polar (Δ G SA) contributions were also favorable for the formation of the complexes. The Δ G values and their components are listed in Table 3.
